text:
@realDonaldTrump 2,012,001 INFECTED
112,596 DEAD

I don't really care what a lowlife, who used MILITARY TACTICS, on PEACEFUL DEMONSTRATORS, just so he could walk across the street, for a PHOTO OP, in front of a HOUSE OF GOD, thinks.
